articles.title: Does Recent Cost Restructuring Make UPS Attractive at Current 2025 Price Levels?
articles.mainIdea: Does Recent Cost Restructuring Make UPS Attractive at Current 2025 Price Levels?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Does Recent Cost Restructuring Make UPS Attractive at Current 2025 Price Levels?. If you are wondering whether United Parcel Service is a bargain or a trap at current levels, especially with all the noise around e commerce and logistics, you are not alone. This article focuses on what the numbers indicate about value. Despite being down 18.7% year to date and 14.4% over the last year, UPS has quietly risen about 0.7% in the last week and 6.4% over the past month. This may indicate that some investors are starting to reassess the risk reward trade off after a challenging...

articles.title: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers
articles.mainIdea: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers
articles.summary: Barrons.com: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers. United Parcel Service has had a devil of a year. While UPS’s dividend yield, one of the highest in the looks tantalizing, Wolfe Research strategist Chris Senyek points out that being in the highest-yielding club doesn’t typically add up to stock market success. Related tickers mentioned: CPB, F, VZ, ^GSPC.
